::Battera::

She spoke into her commlink, "I'm Battera.  I'm just out for a joy 
flight.  I'm not going to be any trouble to you, I'm just flying by.  
Sorry to have bothered you."  She hoped that they wouldn't attack.  
She just wasn't in the mood for a fight.  She wanted to just fly off 
and enjoy the sky and wind under her wings.  But she was curious as 
tot he big red flyer she saw leaving the volcano though.  Then she 
thought about how someone knew she was there.  Her eyes widened.  She 
suddenly realized that she was flying over a base.  It was well 
hidden but it was there.  That's why the flyer left the base of the 
volcano and that's why someone talked to her thought the telecomm.  
There was a base down there that she couldn't see.  She used her 
sonar and found the hollow of the volcano and the base inside. She 
kept going on the same flight path hoping that they woudn;t thin her 
a threat.  If the base opened fire on her, she would have a slim to 
none chance of making out alive.
